title: Beat the Boss 4: Stress-Relief Game. Hit the buddy
description:
Let off some steam in this action adventure game with over 20,000,000 + downloads from the creators behind Tap Titans 2 and Battle Bouncers.  

Get ready to aim, shoot, and destroy evil robot bosses in the smashing new update to the epic Beat The Boss franchise. 

Dealing with a cruel robot boss who’s nothing more than a bully? Looking at them just makes you want to beat the living daylight out of them.

Turn that rage and office stress into a therapeutic release as you fight against the clock to explode, beat, and destroy the evil robot Boss Joe. 

Crush enemies and your own personalized villains with custom crafted weapons. Release the mass havoc of monkeys, wield a samurai sword, or unleash the explosive power of a colossal diarrhea gun on your workplace foes! 

WITH BEAT THE BOSS 4 YOU CAN:
★ PLAY the relaxing interactive office simulator offline and at your desk
★ FIGHT against 200+ uniquely designed wicked bosses who make life miserable 
★ COLLECT over 190+ destructive weapons and build up your arsenal of ammunition 
★ UNLOCK the immersive world map, with over 10 hand drawn realms and 30 entertaining stages
★ CRAFT custom weapons from automatic rifles to fireworks in order to release your anger
★ PERSONALIZE your own custom boss, get ready to crush your real-life nemesis! 
★ LEVEL UP your boss fighting skills by collecting gold and diamonds to boost your destructive power

ABOUT BEAT THE BOSS 4:
Robo Joe is on a mission to make your workplace hostile and miserable! 
Don’t want to walk into that familiar office on Monday morning? Dealing with the unresolved stress from the last time your boss made your life difficult? Beat The Boss 4 is the healthy way of dealing with office stress and it's better than yoga! 

Get back virtually at your dentist, smash that high-school bully, or travel to space to defeat aliens in this interactive simulation action game. As you adventure down the scenic world map, find out where Robo Joe’s from and why you need to take vengeance and 
kick his ignorant robot buddies. Collect gold coins and diamonds with each hit as you whack your boss to buy hilarious and more destructive weapons, turning that office into a war zone!

From beehives to office supplies, and even grenades, the possibilities to get back at your foes are endless. Beware, don’t let your coldhearted android manager go into their shield! Customize weapons to unleash devastating attacks and let out that pent up anger in the ultimate stress relief game. 

Wage war with the evil Robo Joe and his machine buddies. Buckle up and prepare to riot as you grab your guns and assassinate an onslaught of horrible bosses in this funny fighting game! Drop and smash massive weapons on your robot foes, and reel in that satisfactory feeling from hunting your enemies! 

Your therapist and colleagues will thank you so start taking revenge and go have some fun!

TALK TO US!
Join your fed up coworkers on
★ Facebook: facebook.com/beatthebossgame
★ Discord: discord.gg/gamehive
★ Twitter: twitter.com/beattheboss4
★ Instagram: instagram.com/beatthebossgame
★ Blog: gamehive.com/blog
★ Youtube: youtube.com/user/GameHiveVideo

comments: As such there is no issues but some glitches i own more than 20 maps but the game says that i only own 1 and the skins the game has ate awesome but if u apply it on some particuler weapon it looks very weird.At the end the game has a large variety of awesome wepons to chose from .

This is such, and STILL a great game. The reason for this is airplane mode. This gets rid of all ads an snakes gameplay less laggy. The huge selection of guns and weapons is pretty good. The bosses are nice, and everything in it is amazingly incredible. Overall I made this page to tell you to use airplane mode and get the creator more positive reviews. But still get rid of some ads. Thank you. 😉

I love this game a lot but when I beaten the bosses in the first ten maps then relaunch the app when I come off it, some of the bosses reset for no reason and I have to keep beating them up again and again. These bosses that reset are on map three, four, five, six, seven, eight, and nine. Can you fix this bug please. P. S. Thank you for changing all of the bosses into humans again.

Its so sad that this game sold out. Used to be an amazing game. Now there are UNSKIPPABLE ADs everywhere. It was one of my favourite games, and is now awful to endure. When the option pops up to watch an add to "double the reward" whether you choose to double it or not you will STILL have to watch an add as it plays automatically regardless of the button you press. Some of these ads even have a function where they reroute you out of the app and straight to the googleplay download page. Awful

The game was fun at first until it started lagging and glitching out on me. The screen goes black every five minutes and sometimes the boss will disappear from the screen completely making me restart the app. And if there's more than ten maps it won't let me scroll through the rest of them. It only shows maps 1 through 10.

title: High School Story
description:
Throw parties, make friends, and date the coolest kids in town... in YOUR High School Story!

Play as a jock, nerd, or prep - the choice is yours as you live your teenage years your way! Be the guy or girl that EVERYONE wants to know!

Attend parties with new friends at homecoming or prom to add them to the campus of your dreams, and check out the Isle of Love where romance is in the air! Get an all-star boyfriend... or date the head cheerleader! Go on wild trips with your classmates, and learn all their secrets! Discover these and hundreds of other stories at your awesome campus today!

- Add UNIQUE CLASSMATES to your squad! From prom kings to homecoming queens, befriend them all!
- Become BFFs with awesome characters like Payton in THE PARTY GIRL or Nishan in MISSION NERDPOSSIBLE!
- Host parties to meet over 30 CLASSMATE TYPES! Writers, cheerleaders, rock climbers, and more!
- Date YOUR CRUSH and help your BFFs find romance too!
- Meet cute boys and girls at the FANTASY PHOTOBOOTH, and make your choice!
- Battle a rival high school at the epic HOMECOMING GAME!
- Get pumped up with the cheer captain at CHEERLEADER CAMP!
- Nerd out at the SCIENCE FAIR, or get creative in a massive PRANK WAR with your classmates!
- Decorate your DREAM CAMPUS with everything from prom thrones to boxes of puppies!
- Customize your look! Casual or formal, nerdy or sporty... YOU CHOOSE!
- Dress up in FORMALWEAR for prom and romance your date on the dance floor!
- GO STEADY with a hot girl or boyfriend, and PLAY MATCHMAKER for your friends!
- Get an intro to coding in a special quest with GIRLS WHO CODE!
- Learn advanced high school vocabulary words in FUN MINI-GAMES!
- Enjoy new stories, romances, parties, and choices EVERY WEEK!

High School Story is completely free to play, but you can purchase some in-game items with real money. If you do not want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

-----------------------------------------------
To our players:  Thank you for your passion.  Pixelberry is a firm believer that games can make a difference.  And you’ve proven they can.  

When we partnered with non-profits, like The Cybersmile Foundation, a cyberbullying non-profit, and the National Eating Disorders Association (NEDA) you responded with great enthusiasm.  Together, we’ve done some amazing things. 
* Over 4 million players have learned more about cyberbullying.
* Over 30,000 players have visited NEDA's sites to learn more about eating disorders.
* And thousands of players have reached out to Cybersmile, often for help with bullying.

Thank you!  We sincerely appreciate your enthusiasm and support.

- The Pixelberry Team

Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at:
http://www.highschoolstory.com/terms-of-service/
Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at:
http://www.highschoolstory.com/privacy-policy/

comments: The game is good but some stuff are confusing, I'm not talking about the storyline being confusing I'm talking about how a student costs 500 coins yet you only need 100 coins to buy land...what? Speaking about coins it's easy to get them however its way more easier to spend the coins I say GET THE GAME RIGHT NOW OR YOU'LL REGRET IT! I haven't been playing for long so I can't say anything much. But once I've played for a while, I'll come back and share my honest opinion. Thank You

I love the game but it's kinda hard to do more things or stuff with lack of rings but all in all it's kinda not a problem. I'm really enjoying every second! My cousin tried to cheat and changed her date and time and she told me when she put it back on the right day and time again, she checked the game and found out that her parties and dates will be over in 7 days and 23 hours! 🤣🤣🤣Great job with that!

The game is a great game but when the main focus is money it makes it very irritating to play. All the players you need to advance or do missions cost a gargantuan amount of rings, books, or coins. The amount of free rings and pencils for the mini game is so small in comparison it's like you didn't get anything for free at all.

Ok so I love this game but the one thing that made me give it a four instead of a five star was the fact that its not letting me link my friend from Facebook nor Google, I hope that it will get fixed soon because I do love this game. Also I found its doing it to the other game Hollywood U too. Also if its not too much to ask can you do more updates on the game like for cirten holidays?

This game was my absoulte favorite for about 7 months... Up until this morning, when my data was lost forever... I dont know why, i dont know how. title: Stress Reliever Game: Smash Things Destroy Games
description:
Do you hate your annoying boss and want to beat the daylight out of him? Or colleagues are getting on your nerve? Hate your noisy neighbours having a house party? No worries! Smash it! Smasher Stress Relief game is here to save the day. Unique stress reliever games helps you blow off steam, calm your anger and reduce anxiety. Grab melee weapon of your choice to be furious boss and attack the party in stress reliever games. Smash and hit household objects to cause rampage & ultimate destruction. Smash office, school, house appliances like LED TV’s, expensive furniture, immaculate glass tables, electronics and more in stress relief games.

It’s time to relieve stress by destroying things in destroy games:
Use Axe, hammer, baseball bat and many other weapons to cause destruction and beat your enemies in smash rampage games. Release your anger and crush everything in the virtual destruction just like in angry grandpa or city, office smasher games. When people are stressed they are attracted to physical destruction the most, this stress reliever games helps you calm your nerves. Don’t have to be a school bully and smash the high school furniture with destructive weapons, fill the rage meter and knockout the angry school teacher in stress games. Unlike most high school bully games, you can beat crazy people in classroom and destroy everything in high school games. Because more house destruction in furious office games, earn virtual cash and unlock more powerful & legendary weapons in stress reliever games. Destroy every object in rage room to calm your nerves and kick the things in destroy games.

Having a bad day at the job and can’t bear your annoying boss? It's time for some action. Grab a melee weapon and destroy office stuff. Smash everything that comes in your way laptops, computers, office furniture and more. Wide range of weapons including knife, baseball, rifle, shotgun each with different destructive power. Hit office buddy and kick the boss to calm your anger and crush everything at workplace to release stress and anger in stress games.

As virtual school boy start smashing things in high school classroom and beat students bully gang. Choose favourite weapon and destroy stuff in scary office house, office or high school. title: SafeOregon
description: Everyone has the right to feel safe at school. Kids and teens use SafeOregon to report bullying and school safety incidents. Someone at your school has been bullied and needs you to step up and help. Reports can be sent anonymously and go directly to your school principal. The app is easy to use with only three screens before the submit button. Most of the questions have a list of options to choose from, so you don't need to type too much information. You can also send in a report online at tips.safeoregon.com.

title: You. Me. Heaven.
description:
Tova used to be a real bully back in school, many years ago. One day a strange shadow knocks her door and brings back a slice of her dirty past.

”You. Me. Heaven.” is a classic point-and-click-adventure, a pitch black surreal comedy, with two playable protagonists; The former bully Tova, and the bullying victim ”The new girl”. 

Visit the fearsome Castle Death Spider(tm), meet lots of zany characters, play rock paper and scissors against an evil warlock, participate in the surreal family show ”Guests with chests”, find out what’s behind the secret door in Tovas basement (but there IS no basement… or is there?), go beyond space and time to a secret alternative dimension… and make choices that shapes the story and it’s resolution.

This is not a game about heroes. This is a game about a shy bullied girl, and about a former bully’s journey through anguish and remorse.

”You. Me. Heaven.” is an independent follow-up on the critically-acclaimed surreal point-and-click-adventure ”You. Me. Hell.”, but doesn’t require you to have played the first game first.

”You. Me. Heaven.” is not a game for kids. It contains strong language, violence and gore, zombies, weapons, flesh eating bacteria, sad dolls, Dala-horses, pumpkins and lots of pitch-black lethal humor.

If you get stuck, check the full walkthrough at:
http://www.biscuitplacebo.com/you_me_heaven/you_me_heaven_-_walkthrough.txt

title: ComBuS
description:
Bullying is a pattern of behaviour rather than an isolated event. The most common form of bullying is verbal, which can lead to physical violence, if left unchecked (Pinheiro, Paulo Seìrgio, UN Study on Violence against Children, p. 121). Despite the efforts in national and European level, bullying appears to be an escalating challenge.

The central aim of the ComBuS is to increase the capacity and raise awareness in combating bullying among the abovementioned target groups, by providing them face-to-face, online and mobile methodologies, tools and activities.

title: Bully's Kids Club
description:
The Bully's Kids Club app from Mississippi State is for Parents to manage their children's accounts.

With the Bully's Kids Club app you can:
	- Log into your parent account and view your children's kids club details
	- See upcoming events that you can attend for points
	- Check in one or more children to events to earn points
	- See each child's point total and browse the prize store
	- Explore all the ways your children can earn points
	- Reset your rewards account password

At this time a Parent account login is required for access. Additional children can not be registered through the app, but you can visit BullysKidsClub.com on your home computer to sign up.

title: Strike Master Bowling - Free
description:
Features:

• ONE SWIPE BOWLING - gets you bowling Strikes in no time, but also helps you develop skills to master an awesome banana bend. Free bowling games have been waiting for this - control the speed, trajectory, and spin on your ball in one simple swipe to launch it down the lane.

• DESIGN YOUR BOWLER - Unique to Strike Master, select face type, hair, eye color, clothes and more to create your own unique bowling character. Use him/her online to show off and make people remember you.

• ONLINE ACTION - take on the best, or your pals in online or local multiplayer matches.

• SKILL SHOT CHALLENGES - 40+ hand-crafted special shots with pins in lines, pinball-style poppers, ramps and more. 10 pins doesn't seem so easy when they're in a line.

• CUTTING EDGE - Full of fancy 3D shaders, animated alleys and with the best and most accurate physics engine around, Strike Master Bowling has everything covered and in full 3D.

• ACTION REPLAYS - Celebrate your strikes and spares by watching them again in slow motion, all beautifully rendered.

• 11 TOURNAMENT MODES to play, including Free Roll, Small is Beautiful, Strike Master Challenge and Risky Rumble.

• FOUR GAME MODES to get stuck into; Practice, Tournament, League and On-line.

• EIGHT AWESOME LANES to bowl from the glamour of Vegas to a submarine lane in an aquarium, a neon palace or even an alien invasion themed folly! 

• 125 BOWLING BALLS - from beautifully marbled, baseball and basketball like balls, and even glass bowling balls encasing flowers and even particle emitters!

• ACHIEVEMENTS to bag including ‘Millionaire’, ‘Elite Bowler’ and ‘Local Champ'

• SAVE GAMES across devices with Cloud Save – climb up the leagues on multiple devices and never lose your progress.

Strike Master Bowling gives you it all, in one handy 3D game, and best of all it's free with no need to spend endless money to get anywhere.

• ACHIEVEMENTS to bag including ‘Millionaire’, ‘Elite Bowler’ and ‘Local Champ'

• SAVE GAMES across devices with Cloud Save – climb up the leagues on multiple devices and never lose your progress.

Strike Master Bowling gives you it all, in one handy 3D game, and best of all it's free with no need to spend endless money to get anywhere.
summary: One-touch bowling with the best physics and the fanciest bowling balls, all free

recentChanges: Ball fix.
comments: The game glitched and cheated me on an important match . I clearly rolled a strike, the pin set came down to no pins yet only counted 9 pins and wanted me to roll another ball before it would carry on with the game. That would have greatly affected my score causing me to loose. I paused the game and tried to explain what happened but got no reply in over 2days. When I went back to see if anything was taken care of I unpaused the game to see myself rolling the ball that I hadn't played! Anybody??

Don't Like how hard it's hard to pick up splits like especially the 7-10 Split. It like it's impossible to get a 7- 10 split. Maybe you are the only one that can get a 7-10 Split because my ball only hits one bowling pin and falls into the gutter. Even when I try to get a 7-10 split, it's hard to convert. All I can do is hit either the 7 pin or just the 10 pin. Well I did convert and earned a achievement which is the big 4 split.

Beautiful game with absolutely horrible controls and mechanics. IT IS LITERALLY EASIER TO BOWL IN REAL LIFE! And that should never be the case with a game. Outrageously inconsistent results when rolling. Work on the controls and the rating easily goes up.

I played other bowling games and they were too easy. Just bowl straight to get strike. The ball in this game behaves like a real ball with no way other than practice to get that nice roll. Others games the ball doesn't hook but this game you have the option of hooking the ball or not depending on how you touch the screen. It feels like being at the alley.

Sensational my name does not appear on my profile and I am not treated like other players.why? would like to install if that problem is rectified.thank you I have a good name.why don't I show up on the screen bowling like other players???????okay love the new look.maybe you good add comment s player to player on the bowling rink????

title: Andrea
description:
Andrea es una herramienta de comunicación para combatir el acoso escolar, la cual te permite alertar de forma anónima sobre casos de acoso escolar ciberacoso u otros problemas en el ámbito educativo.

Envía alertas anónimas de diferentes tipos de acoso escolar o bullying (físico, verbal, ciberacoso, ... ) o abre un chat anónimo, que serán atendidos por profesionales educativos. 

Una alerta anónima es la solución para casos de acoso que permanecen ocultos. Andrea proporciona un apoyo esencial para convertir en observadores activos a personas que quieran informar pero no tengan las herramientas adecuadas.

Descárgate Andrea y actúa contra el acoso.

Andrea App es un proyecto de Nectar Estudio realizado con el apoyo del Ajuntament de València.

¿Quieres más información sobre Andrea?
Visita nuestra web: https://www.soyandrea.es

¿Te gusta Andrea?
Danos un ""Me gusta"" en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/soyAndrea.es
Síguenos en Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/soyandrea.es/
Y también en Twitter: https://twitter.com/soyAndrea_es

title: Fruit Ninja 2
description:
Fruit Ninja is one of the most fun games of all time. Come see the next game in the Fruitasia universe!

Ready your blade! Everyone's fun, fruit slicing action game is back with the addition of fun mini games and real-time competitive action!

Enjoy all the action as you challenge other ninjas from around the world. No other games come close to providing as much fun as you work your way up the ranks to become the Fruit Ninja champion. Whether your reflexes are sharp, wisdom is deep, or you just really hate organic food, Fruit Ninja 2 promises to give you fun, engaging games in action packed slices of time. So what are you waiting for? Draw your blade and prepare to slice!

FEATURES:
- The most addictively fun action games on mobile
- Turn up the action when you unleash all new fun powerups
- Collect insanely fun legendary blades to get the edge over your opponents
- Beautiful arenas set the stage for ultimate action packed games
- Join the fun and become a Fruit Ninja champion by slicing your way up through the leagues
- Master combos, criticals, and blitzing to win more games than your friends and family
- Experience the fun and action of a whole new range of Fruit Ninja mini games
- Show off your inner ninja as you unlock fun new characters and taunt packs

Privacy policy: http://halfbrick.com/pp
Terms of service: http://halfbrick.com/tos

title: High School Adventure
description:
Can you escape from the bully and win the contest?

A poster design contest at school is an excellent opportunity for Ellie and Alex to show their talent. In order to win the challenge, you need to find hidden objects, solve puzzles, break codes and test your logic skills! The only problem is that Buster, the school bully, would do everything he can to prevent Ellie and Alex from winning. Can you help Ellie and Alex beat Buster, overcome their obstacles and win the contest?

High School Adventure is a classic adventure game for all ages. The game includes English voice over.

↗ Amazing graphics!
↗ Innovative puzzles!
↗ Catchy humor!
↗ English voice over!
↗ Room escape game elements!
↗ 100% FREE!

title: Baseball Superstars 2020
description:
Control your team's destiny and build your perfect team with endless customization! 

The EPIC baseball RPG is back and better than ever with more style, more modes, and more customization!
Re-experience the game that millions have fallen in love with!
Collect and upgrade cool and iconic trainers to help you on your epic journey to become the best baseball team in the Galaxy!

▶ Endless Customization
Customize your team's logo, stadium, and equipment.
Recruit, combine, develop your players to assemble the best team in the game.

▶ Touch Intuitive My Batter and My Pitcher Modes
Create and customize your pitch to your own unique style and time your hits with the new batting mechanism.

▶ Complete Team Management
Develop your players by changing their appearance, fielding position, equipment, trainers, items and more!
Manage your trainers to become the best in the Galaxy.

▶ Explore the Epic World of Baseball Superstars
Play in a variety of modes like Galaxy Cup, Lecter's Lab, DIA Home Run Derby, Planet League, Superstar League, and Daily Match to help you become the greatest Superstar in the galaxy!

▶ Over 100+ Trainers to push your team to the top!
Collect trainers that are out of this world to help you develop your skills at every position

▣ Visit Here to Learn More Baseball Superstars!▣
▶ Facebook Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/BaseballSuperstarsEN
▶ Wiki: https://baseball-superstars-2020.fandom.com/wiki/Baseball_Superstars_2020_Wiki
▶ Discord: https://discord.gg/ukX4YPW

** Minimum system requirements: 2GB of RAM
** Baseball Superstars is available in 한국어, English, 日本語, 中文繁體, Español.
** Game is free to play, but offers in-app purchases. You can disable in-app purchases through your device's settings.

▶Permission Guidelines
App will request permissions in order to provide certain services.

[Optional Permissions]
- Phone (Device): Permission is required in order to run in-game events, reward prizes, and check OS versions/device models to handle customer inquiries. The app will not affect or access phone features such as phone calls.
- Storage (Photos/Media/Files): This permission is required to store and load your gameplay screenshots and video captures. Only gameplay data will be accessed. (*If you are logged in through HIVE using Android OS 4.4 or under, this permission is also required to change your profile image.)

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support: https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html

comments: The micro transactions are nuts. We're talking some the worst around. $60 USD dollars for 760 gems. That is only enough for 1 gacha type system summon. I've played for a while so I know when I say. Play if you like baseball. It is simple and fun, the customization of players and building a team of created players is fun, but don't spend money.

I played back during BS2 and remembered it being one of my favorite mobile games at the time. Saw people say it no longer worked which is natural for Gamevil. Then a saw there was a 2020 game. Gave it a shot and it's still pretty cool. Still in the newbie period so unsure if it'll last but for now it's a ton of fun.

I always wonders what the F the devs thinking when they design the upgrade system and microtransactions, pricing it hundreds times more expensive than AAA games. Let's talk about upgrade system, you need exact same trainer card to upgrade said trainer, while it not a problem for crappy green trainer, good luck finding those SR or UR trainer. Unless you blow THOUSANDS of dollars, goodluck grind your asses progressing through this cashgrab. -4 stars for greedy ass devs and publisher.

Love this game! Been playing for years on and off and this version is deep. Fast play through times to level up the players and cool stories that you can skip or fast forward after you've watched them for the 100th time. Great game, and it has a user manual to help you do whatever your thinking of finding.

alright I been fan of baseball superstar since 2013. I spend 3 weeks on playing. it's a fun games but the microtransaction is so expensive than the 2013 . Another is one is the lack of pvp sure there is club if you join the club and superstar league but PvP is where real time players will face each other. But so far the game is good even tho it's pay to win you can improve your team and player without spending if you have patience and dedication.

title: Toon Blast
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! 

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

● Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
● Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
● Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
● Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! 
● Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! 
● Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

developerAddress: Turkey
recentChanges:
PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS!
Toon Blast introduces the Gelato Runaway episode with 50 new levels!
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content.
Come and join the fun!
comments: It starts out as a really fun and challenging game, until you advance to higher levels. It becomes nearly impossible to win certain levels without money, boosters or making purchases. No one likes impossible odds. You continually lose on a level just 1 or 2 moves away from winning. So very frustrating! The more you play, the more you realize, there's no skill or strategy, there's not even chance. The game is anything but random: it's totally controlled and manipulated by the game's programming.

I like the game and how challenging the levels are, but the reason for the rating is that it sucks that the only way to save progress is by signing in with Facebook. I'm not a fan of Facebook and wish there was other options to sign in like Candy Crush has. The rewards could be way better the higher you move up the level not the same as the first 20 levels.

Loved playing this game and did so for quite some time. I got permanently banned because of I was accused of cheating. I was using 2 names. I however, wasnt using both. My grandchildren were. So my advice to all is dont use more than 1 name. Lesson learned. Never would have done that if I knew. Read the rules folks. This is an awesome game though and I will miss it horribly.

A little advice about this game. I have been playing for 2 years now.Been hearing how difficult this game is. I have learned to take my time on difficult level's. Their is no time line to complete a game. With knowing this I am able to figure out the difficult level's. I find this game challenging but rewarding. If it becomes hard just take a break and return when ready. Don't give up. The hard levels aren't impossible. Maranatha!!

This game is addictive because of the teams. When it gets too difficult; and it does; you'll find it necessary to buy boosters with real money. ...It sucks when you can't contribute to your team during the tournaments. Don't fall for the free coins, and unlimited lives scam, that will show up in team chat. I'd give this game five stars, but it's too difficult (to do so😉).

title: Among Us
description:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship. 

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
descriptionHTML:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
summary: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal!
developerAddress:
PO Box 2532
Redmond, WA 98073
recentChanges: * Add support for 6 digit room codes.
comments: This is a very fun and addicting game, I love all of the features but I would recommend to add some features like:- 1. Creating an account and having the same name, but you can change it anytime you want, so by having an account we can add friends. 2. Add a voice feature for more fun, but still the chat feature should be there for people uncomfortable to talk. 3. Changing the amount of impostors and changing the map while being in the lobby as people misclick usually. I hope you can add this.

Great game. Has clearly grown in popularity since lockdown: almost everyone i know is playing it! I have a few improvements though that may make the game more enjoyable for people (like me) who cant spend money in games. One thing i would suggest is adding 'achievements', so that players can unlock some pets, skins, etc. Of course, you could also buy them with real money, but this gives people a chance to earn them instead of buying them. Also, seasonal kill animations would be cool. (Xmas, etc)

I honestly didn't get the point of it all, until I played it. The game is great! And as an app is even better! Getting used to the controls takes a bit of time, but it's surprisingly user friendly. My only problem so far has been with the keyboard (it blocks the entire screen and is really slow, but only ingame) and how other apps, specifically Messenger, can't display over it.

Very fun and addictive game!! However there are a few bugs and tips I could give. For me there is a glitch as the imposter where someone will report a body or call a meeting, but, I will hear the chat going off but im still playing the game, and everyone is frozen. Idk if that has happend to anyone else but if you could fix that that would be great! And also being a ghost is kind of boring. If you could give the ghost some extra things to do that would also be great. Other that that great game!

The game is amazing. Love the simplicity of the game, very enjoyable when playing with friends. Which brings up the topic of a friend system, sometimes it's hard to gather close friends. You can often meet some great people in lobbies, but the only problem is you cannot add them to play in the future which is a shame because this can definitely keep the community growing/make players stay. Love the game none the less. (Also hoping to see more add ons/maps in the future!!)

title: Stop Bashing!
description:
Stop Bashing! be cool
Stop Bashing! is an easy-to-use free app that helps your children and teens deal with cyber-bullying. Say stop! to cyber-bullying,  maintain the dialogue,  help them react accordingly and feel reassured. Your children will not keep the cyber-bullying risk inside but will use this innovative image-based comunication tool between them and you.

Key features:
- Your children send you a photo/screen shot
- You answer with a stop bashing smiley:
===> the red one to confirm that it is bullying and we’ll help.
===> the orange one to say “let's discuss about it”.
===> the green one to say it’s acceptable, it's just for kidding, no matter to be worried about.
- For emergency: your children have access to you and/or 911 through the app.

Stop Bashing! premium features : add geolocation
Stop Bashing! premium features : add a child

Stop Bashing! is free to download and use. Stop Bashing! premiums add the great features above and are available through payments in app.

------------------------
------------------------
Here are some ways to use Stop Bashing! with your children:  3 steps!
1/ Create a family account on your mobile phone : choose a secret family code, insert your name, email and mobile phone number.
2/ Add new members: create as many child account as you need; and one for a second parent if you wish.
3/ Download the app on your children smartphones: login with your children mobile phone number and your family secret’s code.

This way, all the young population can have access to Stop Bashing!  and with a trusted adult they can fight any form of bashing. title: Stop Bully
description:
Provides a convenient tool for reporting bullying incidents through the network of schools and school districts associated with StopBully.com/StopBully.org. Reports are sent confidentially through the system to pre-designated "trusted adults" who are configured for the individual school where the incident occurred.

Incidents may be logged by anyone, including the victim/target or other bystanders/witnesses.

StopBully.com began in 2001. It began as a one time publication in the form of an 80 page book aimed at educating parents and children alike of the consequences of Bullying and how to effectively deal with the issue when one becomes directly involved. This book was originally released and distributed by the KIDS INTERNATIONAL DISCOVERING SAFETY FOUNDATION and the book was supported by this web site. Very quickly it was recognized that there was a need for a program beyond a book and StopBully.com became its own entity.

title: Fightroom Free
description:
Imagine you wake up in a room with 4 doors, endless waves of enemies trying to slap you against the walls and you cannot escape through one of the doors because,.. because.. the developer of this game scripted it so...!

Survive as long as you can and set the bodycounter up to the sky!!

Fight with brain and don't waste all your energy on one single bully. Use the blockstance to avoid damage.

Submit your hightest Bodycounter to the Global Leaderboard and let the world see what you've got!

***Manual***
P-Button = Punch, deals only small amount of damage but also stuns the bully for 1 sec (immune after 2 stuns)
K-Button = Kick, deals average damage and is also a fast skill
R-Button = Roundhouse, deals the most damage but needs the most time
B-Button = Sets you in blockstance to block incoming damage, holds until you hit or your blockbar is at zero. You can't walk in this stance.

Sadly it's not running smoothly on low hardware devices.

title: Anonymous Alerts®
description:
Anonymous Alerts® is a complete anonymous reporting system and software management system. It is simple, secure and enables a submitter to quickly report incidents relating to violence, bullying, cyberbullying, depression, drugs, gang-related issues, harassment, suicide threats, cutting or other self-harm, social isolation or withdrawal, weapons (brought to school/or discussion about using them) or unusual behavior which may warrant immediate attention by officials or law enforecemnt. A submitter can establish anonymous 2-way communications® with authorized personnel. Anonymous Alerts is Patented (U.S. Patent No. 9,071,579).


The Anonymous Alerts® reporting app was created to help students, parents or community members choose a school official to contact, type of incident to report, school building and/or a specific location, set a priority level of normal or high and upload a photo, screenshot or video related to the incident. 

At first, the school or school district provides a login ID and password for a student or parent to login with and send a report directly to their school official(s). Students and parents have access to their content that is specific to their school or district. Once the user login ID and password are saved they can report incidents at any time. The Anonymous Alerts® system encrypts tips so that school officials can respond to a tipster without being able to identify the person. Our system also alternately allows tipsters to identify themselves. 

Students can use the Smart Button® to report their GPS location if lost, abducted or in a dangerous situations. Our Smart Button® can also be used by a school official to report their GPS location in dangerous situations.

Anonymous Alerts® helps detect, deny and control bullying, safety and mental health issues in schools, the workplace and universities. The app is free to download. Anonymous Alerts® App requires a subscription and is customized with your organization name, locations and school officials to contact and phone numbers. If your school or school district is not a current subscriber of Anonymous Alerts® ask them to request a subscription.

title: BAND - App for all groups
description:
Organize your group on BAND! It’s the perfect group communication app, with features like the Community Board, Shared Calendar, Polls, To-Do Lists, Private Chat & much more!


BAND is BEST for:

● Sports Teams – Keep track of game days and team practices with the Calendar, send quick notifications about canceled practices, and share team videos and photos, all in one place.

● Work/Projects - Share files and keep everyone in the loop with the community board. Have a quick group call with remote teams. Hold everyone accountable with shared to-do lists.

● School Groups - Plan all your school events easily with the group Calendar. Use Polls to plan activities and food options. Send group messages to keep everyone updated.

● Faith Groups - Organize activities with weekly notices and event RSVPs. Support each other throughout the week by privately sharing prayer requests through chat.

● Gaming Clans and Guilds - Set up a raiding schedule with the group calendar and share important information about any game with all your members. Use multiple chat rooms to find groups, manage recruitment and share strategies.

● Family, Friends, Communities - Stay connected with your family and friends. BAND also has Public groups! Use the Discover feature to find communities with similar interests.


Why BAND?

BAND is the best way to stay connected with your group! BAND is trusted by group leaders as the Official Team Communication App for Varsity Spirit, AYSO, USBands, and Legacy Global Sports.

● Be social & stay organized in the same place
Community Board / Calendar / Poll / Group File Sharing / Photo Album / Private Chat / Group Call

● Create or join a space that meets your group’s unique needs
Adjust privacy settings (secret, closed, public), control notifications, manage members (admin & co-admins), assign privileges, and make a vanity URL or home cover design dedicated to your group. Customize your group and use it how you want to!

● Accessibility
You can chat wherever you are. BAND can be used on any device including your phone, desktop, or tablet by going to http://band.us.
We value your feedback! Send us your feedback and/or suggestions so we can make BAND better for you & your groups.
 

Help Center: http://go.band.us/help/en
Facebook: www.facebook.com/BANDglobal
Youtube: www.youtube.com/user/bandapplication
Twitter: @BANDtogetherapp @BAND_Gaming
Instagram: thebandapp
Blog: blog.band.com

comments: Band has been fantastic! I've been using it for the last 3 years since I became cheer director for our local youth league. It keeps me organized and everything in one spot. Its so helpful with parents. You can add everyone to your band and set things how you want them. They even have a live streaming option, polls, attendance and sooo much more. I will always use band for any group stuff I may have.

I love the original Band App. It works so well from. My team at work and our daughters softball team to communicate with the parents. I recently downloaded the BAND FOR KIDS for my daughter to talk to her teammates, it hasn't worked yet. I have paid 2 different times, $.50 and I still can't make it work.

Great app--has essentially transformed our group's communication. Feature request: Please allow toggling the visibility of calendars within a Band. If we have multiple calendars created for different purposes, it would be nice to be able to declutter the agenda view by hiding events from irrelevant calendars. Also, please let us specify an individual calendar (when there are multiple) from a specific band when we are creating a widget. Thank you, developers!

This is a excellent app. I was able to listen enjoy and be a part of a church service that was active. Thank you Pastor Rodrick Reeve of New Creation family worship center. Also the staff and congregation. Love the way it works. I will tell others how good it is. Thanks.🤩

Perhaps the best application to manage a sports team activities and keep everyone coordinated and on the same page. Same is true for the recording project, as it is a platform to have all the materials shared and updated between the participants.

title: Real Steel World Robot Boxing
description:
Join Atom, Zeus, Noisy Boy, and many more of your favorite Robots in the battle for supremacy of the Real Steel universe. This exciting action-fighting Robot Boxing and Brawler brings the heroic storytelling and spectacular action from over 100 years of Robot Fighting on to your mobile device! Top the Leaderboards, claim the Championship title and reign supreme as the Ultimate World Robot Boxing Champion. Win big in Versus Leagues & Global Tournaments. 

Achieve greatness in the future of boxing, where gigantic robots pack powerful punches. Unleash your fighting style with Deadly jabs, Uppercuts & Special moves to win world championship belts, collect trophies & knockout friends!

UNLEASH ROBOT TITANS 
Towering over 9 feet tall and weighing over 2000 pounds are your 58 ultimate fighting machines, robot titans & legends including fan favorite superstars – Zeus, Atom, Noisy boy & Twin Cities.

BRAWL WITH REAL-TIME WITH FRIENDS 
Unleash your true self in live local Wi-Fi & Bluetooth multiplayer and earn bragging rights while enjoying the winning moment!

WIN EXCITING CHALLENGES!
Play Career, Multiplayer, and the new Winner Take All Mode to become the All-Category Champion.

EXPERIENCE REAL SPORTS ACTION
Build a roster of your favorite sport robots and take on the Legends in enthralling arenas and stadiums. 

PVP & LIVE EVENTS
Challenge your friends, and battle in global events
Lead the Global Leaderboards

UPGRADE & COLOR YOUR CHAMPION
Fight and Upgrade your robot to be stronger, faster and meaner. Color your robot, express yourself and have some fun in the Paint shop!

SHOWCASE YOUR TRIUMPHS
Win Challenges and exhibit your achievements in an all-new Trophy Room.

ACHIEVE GLORY IN ARENAS
Reign supreme in 11 huge arenas that can barely contain these hulking mean machines.

RELIVE THE INSPIRING MOVIE
Play the official boxing game of the blockbuster movie Real Steel. Take your robot champion from the movie for amazing title winning experiences in this smash hit sequel.

JOIN THE ELITE CLUB OF REAL STEEL FANS
Enjoy regular news on game updates, robots, features, views, video tips and more for Free

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RealSteelWorldRobotBoxing
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/realsteelgames/
Capture player moments on Instagram: https://instagram.com/realsteelgames/

The game is also optimized for tablet devices

This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game power-ups can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store’s settings.

* Permission:
STORAGE: for saving the data and progression.

comments: I to spent many hours and more money than I wanna admit on this game; only to log in today (10/23/29) to none of my robots. I immediately restored my purchases, and was only given 2 of the 7 robots I bought, not to mention any gold, silver, or any other robots i lost. Needless to say I'm not pleased, and it's come to my understanding that this is a quite frequent issue and it's outrageous that this issue hasn't been resolved yet nor have the means by which they handle it gotten better.

I have owned more than 50 robots including Zeus, Metro Gold, Midas Gold, Zeus Gold along with just 4 -5 Super bots remaining to bought and completed level 49. Most of the robots reached level 4 abilities after fully upgradation. Day before yesterday the game asked for update, after which the total picture changed. Now I am back to step one after updating and have lost all the robots. I am totally disappointed about this game. I want to remove all the stars but a single star remains constant.

It's a great game, brings me back to a younger age too! My only complaints is the ad after each fight, and the loading screen glitch and that come after collecting the milestone rewards. Other then that it's a great game and I highly recommend it!

OK what the hell. I think my phone died during a fight so I'm thinking whatever. I lost one no big deal. But the minute I freaking load up the game again all my progress is lost and I now have ZERO ROBOTS. is it because I didn't spend any money? Unbelievable

I have been playing this game for a while and then downloaded it on my current phone and I am now level 50 with every bot that is fully upgraded, other than a few super bots, Cardinal Chaos, Dark Fiend and Psytron, with 5400 Gold. Can you make them so you dont have to be VIP 7 to get them? But now a few days ago, my account said unauthorized access to the game, but now i am able to play some parts, but if i go into the store and live events it says it, can you please help me fix this?

title: Tyran Maton
description:
Tyran Maton is an anti-bullying app targeted to all age ranges. We target to the students and teenagers, office employees,schools,organisations and the impaired which is the deaf-mute.The missions and goals of our team are making bullying prevention a priority, incorporate anti-bullying messages into society and establish intervention programs for socially-vulnerable students.Tyran Maton works with professionals to seek for solutions against bullying. Among our collaborators are doctors, psychologists, schools and teachers.

We strive to accomplish the following solutions. Putting a stop to depression, reducing bullying rate, instilling respect, creates the sense that although everyone is different, everyone is equal.
 
We have 3 main features:
First, Petals of Dahlia
Dahlia is the goddess of fate who determines our destiny. Therefore, our product uses the icon of dahlia to pledge commitment to change the fate. So, our commitment involves cooperation from the victims being open about their problems and from doctors and psychologist in making themselves available to attend to the plights of the victims.

Next, a chance to talk.
Tyran Maton also reaches out to the impaired as we have targeted the mute and deaf. Being victims of bully themselves, Tyran Maton encourages these victims to be positive and talk to others as Tyran Maton provides a more human approached to digital communication.

Lastly, Report IT!
We have a special feature for Premium users whereby users can send screenshots, or videos to act as whistleblowers to alert authorities about incidences. And the identity of the whistleblowers will be kept anonymous.

Tyran Maton too provides news and information reflected to bullying and it incorporates flash cards on types of bullying together is information on prevention and cure for it.

comments: There are not enough pictures to pique my interest and in addition to the money that must be paid in order to make reports. This app is not bad, but is still able to have much more updates to it. The touch processing is also slower a bit making it seem laggy plus it only informs people what bullying does and not really how they can overcome it in reality. Overall, this app can be made better and I hope it will, the objective is definitely on spot, but the app just isn't.

This app is decent, but it doesn't have any original information, it's just copied off a website. There's no point in downloading this app when you can just search up information about bullying in Google. Another thing is that, you need to pay to make a report. No one will pay to make a report about bullying when they can just make a call to the authorities themselves.
great app to help against bullying, recommend for all ages. recommended to download. great design and provide top notch service. I love this app. :)

This is definitely gonna be useful for everyone, bullying will definitely be solved by this app am I right? This app is meant for that, right? Or was I mistaken? Money is not something u really can ask for, do you think kids that don't report bullying to their parents would ask their parents for money and to do what? They'll ask and the kids would say, for an app that reports bullying cuz I'm getting bullied....... Makes sense right?
Very fun and easy to use , didn't realize im actually a bully ,thanks tyran maton for creating awareness of bullying and making the world a better place

title: Football Strike - Multiplayer Soccer
description:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

KEY FEATURES:

• Take your shot and make amazing saves, all with the flick of the finger!
• Play online in Shooting Race and Free Kick modes!
• Play against friends or challenge players from across the world!
• Represent your favourite team! Play as FC Barcelona, Liverpool FC, Borussia Dortmund, and more!
• Conquer an extensive Career Mode to earn medals!
• Upgrade your player and equipment and take on the world’s best!
• Fast-paced gameplay means there’s always action!

comments: Game is very greedy, but fun. Stingy, but fun. Hard to become good. Cost a fortune or a lifetime to get a competitive player. Season pass is very stingy. 6 months of playing and you still will be average in stats. Game is very fun. But I spent $16 and have played for months and I have a long way to go. Game is fun but the creators are the greediest Ive evr seen. Could be one of the best ever, but your kids will learn what being Robbed feels like! Enjoy

The game is entertaining sure.. but the controls are absolutely horrible! Half the time, it doesn't respond well, especially during the goalkeeing.. therefore losing the match.. fix this issue. Edit: Forget about what I said about it being entertaining! It's not!! How can it be when the whole game is rigged at higher levels..

THIS GAME IS HORRIBLE! Do NOT get this game unless you want to be scammed out of coins you bought from your own money. I am barely on level 3 and im constantly going against players who are like level 20. Also whenever try to block a kick it keeps somehow going through my hands like im some kind of ghost. And, whenever i do the 400 coin game it charges me 500 COINS instead of 200! I do not reccomend this game.

Addictive game but annoying as hell when you're put up against someone who's player has so much power in their shot it makes it nearly impossible to save. And when you play against someone on shooting race, sometimes your opponent resets for the next kick so much faster than you do (somehow) you cant win because they're 2 shots ahead of you!

Paid $4.99 for VIP to 3rd Season Anniversary Cup yesterday. Game suddenly restarted in the final match. After restart, lost all VIP benefits. Later a Gold Cup was added to my account... Were is my VIP winner's green striped jersey and other winner's prizes? If you charge real money, test your product! The same issue happened before. That's why I didn't purchase anything extra for the game for a long time. Seems like nothing has changed on your side. That's sad.

title: Bunny Pop
description:
💛🧡❤️️💚💙💜
WELCOME TO THE MOST RELAXING COLOR-MATCHING ADVENTURE!
Bunny Pop is a colorful, fun & highly addictive bubble shooter game that’ll keep you playing for hours!
If you want a game that’s fun, cute, and relaxing, look no further! Challenging without being frustrating, this bubble shooter game is great to pass the time!
💛🧡❤️️💚💙💜

Fire your bubble shooter to save the cute baby bunnies out of trouble! Aim, match and smash the bubbles to help them collect carrots or escape from the Big Bad Wolf. Each bubble you pop will bring a bunny closer to their happily ever after!

Unique levels will require a variety of strategies and tactics to pop all the bubbles and save the bunnies. Match the bubbles and aim carefully before you shoot so you don’t run out of bubbles. Your efforts will be rewarded with coins and special items, so hop to it and bubble shoot your way to victory!

Try Bunny Pop - the best free bubble pop game today!

HOW TO PLAY
🔆 Aim carefully and tap where you want your bubble shooter to go!
🔆 Match 3 or more same-colored bubbles to make them pop!
🔆 Special boosters & items to help you pass trickier levels.
🔆 Pop all the bubbles with minimal shots to score higher.

FEATURES
🔆TONS OF UNIQUE & EXCITING LEVELS!
🔆 EASY AND FUN PLAY! Simple to learn and fun to master!
🔆 EXCITING EVENTS! Earn daily rewards to help you out!
🔆 CONNECT TO FACEBOOK! Share the popping fun with your friends!
🔆 NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Play offline!
🔆 STUNNING GRAPHICS! Soothing soundtrack and gorgeous visual effects


NOTES
• Bunny Pop contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Bunny Pop is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.
• Bunny Pop is available on smartphone or tablet.

PRIVACY POLICY
https://www.bitmango.com/privacy-policy/

EMAIL
contactus@bitmango.com

comments: I used to love playing this game. Unfortunately they have changed it too much. I remember I could spend 10 coins and get 10 balls. Now its 35 coins for 5 balls. Now I only get 5 lives and if I run out of lives my options are of course to pay or to wait. I play this game to relax and can play it for hours. Now with the new heart/life system I can't. I'm very frustrated and disappointed. I'm on level 1445 but don't know if I'll keep playing I appreciate you responding to my review but until I see

This game was fun. However over the past several updates they made it more and more about the money than the players. The game itself is fun. It used to be unlimited lives, but now it's to a heart system. This way you have to pay or wait to pay. The piggy bank is awful. It's just another way for them to make money. The fact that you used to get 5 balls free for watching an ad was fair. Now for 5 balls you pay 35 coins. All signs point to the developers only caring about money.

Another piggy bank cash grab. I am going to uninstall because I refuse to pay for my own progress. If it wasn't a cash grab, why can't you make it to where I can open the piggy bank by watching ads, just like it gives me the option of watching a video for extra moves? Seriously, come up with an idea of your own and maybe it would be better. What a waste of time

My mom and I, love this game so much but the new heart system is so frustrating. This is the only game that she plays over and over again. Please consider getting the old system back is kinda hard to explain to her why her game needs to wait for a while to play again cause she's getting old.

Used to love this game, but the recent changes have made it more frustrating than it's worth. The constant ads, pop ups prompting purchases between each level, the constant piggy bank pop up were a little annoying but still manageable. The last introduction of hearts/lives has made it not worth the play at all. I understand the desire to monetize things, but it was taken too far. I normally buy the full version of the apps I like, but don't see an option for that with this one.

title: Word Wars - Word Game
description:
What do you get when the age-old scrabble board meets amazing modern design? Meet Word Wars, the best and the only scrabble word game with no ads!

Word Wars is more than just a scrabble game to enjoy with friends. Here, classic scrabble wordplay comes together with new age gaming to give you a unique experience. All with no ads to bother you!

This unique online scrabble game is designed for avid scrabble lovers and new players alike. Time to rediscover your favorite childhood game scrabble, in a no ads environment!

Strapped for time? Try the mini scrabble board for quick word battles with friends. What’s more? With no ads to waste your time, you will learn new words every day and in no time, you will become a scrabble master.

Never get tired of waiting on your opponents to play their turn! Play as many scrabble matches as you want at the same time and keep the fun going!

Learn new words on the go and make your opponents scrabble for words!

➤ CLASSIC SCRABBLE EXPERIENCE - Enjoy the evergreen classic scrabble board game in a beautiful new avatar, and with no ads!

➤ PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY - Login with Facebook and start scrabbling with friends!

➤ FIND YOUR MATCH - Get matched with other players based on your skill level and unleash your word wizardry!

➤ BROADCAST CHALLENGES - Throw down the gauntlet to other players and see how many are up for your scrabble challenge!

➤ WEEKLY TOURNAMENTS - Compete in tournaments every week and win grand prizes!

➤ UNIQUE POWER-UPS - Make use of fantastic power-ups that will help you take your scrabble skills to the next level!

➤ CHAT WITH FRIENDS - Stay connected with your scrabble friends and make new ones!

➤ NO ADS – Keep your scrabble streak going with no ads to bother you!

So, what are you waiting for? Don’t waste time on run-of-the-mill games. Get Word Wars now and get your scrabble journey started!

comments: It's a fun way to build your vocabulary.The negatives are: your opponent can take 4 or 5 days before playing their move which is frustrating but more frustrating is the amount of people who think it is an online dating game. Try to chat you up but as soon as you say you're not interested they then don't play the game leaving you having to wait for them to expire. You should be able to close the game without being penalised

I love this game is it's a lot of fun, but there is a down side. Most of the guys that play, not all, most, all they want is chat dirty. This is a game to play and have fun not a dating site. And if you won't talk dirty with them they resign after a few plays. That's the down side. Luckily there are more people who just want to have fun. There needs to be a way to report the dirt.

Although this game has some glitches, overall it's a great Scrabble experience that is fun to play. However, the most recent update has caused the game to crash immediately on the first or second loading screen. Occasionally it makes it to the main screen, whereupon it crashes as soon as I try to click on any of my ongoing Scrabble games in progress. Since it is now totally unusable, I have moved on. Hopefully the developers can fix it in the next version update.

BEWARE ! Once you ask to play with one player from your contact list, your entire contact list will be visible. Asking them to remove your contact list and you get no where. I am still asking. I got a response but useless. Contact list still on here. I had to uninstall the game and reinstall under new gaming name, losing all my points that I bought BUT my contact list is gone.

The game app is STILL freezing due to an "ANR input dispatching timed out" programming error. I send reports daily to the game programmer but still no fix in sight. NOT HAPPY. Previously - While I LOVE this game I am letting my opponents down by abandoning games due to all the loading freezes. At the very least, put a banner up telling ALL PLAYERS that some users are experiencing difficulties & game play has been interrupted. It's the right thing to do. Where is this promised update? UGH!

comments: Very few ads, and you can skip them anyway. Fun game, good time killer. If you like bowling games, grab this one. I've read other reviews of this app, and I disagree with most. I've read that the game would be better if you "had more control of the ball" or to "have better English" . HELLO!! you have TOTAL CONTROL of the ball!! You can almost do figure 8ts down the alley! Just use your finger to manipulate the ball, and you can get perfect games! I've bowled 3 straight strike perfect games!

Clearly a lot of time and trouble went into this. The graphics and sounds are great. Unfortunately, it doesn't feel a bit like real bowling. When you're ready to throw, you can't swing the ball back to give it "momentum" or spin. You can't even pick it up—all you can do is slide it sideways on the ground. To throw, you must push it forward, like you're stepping over the foul line into the lane. Totally unnatural. I wonder if these developers have ever actually bowled in real life? 🤷‍♂️

Better than many I have tried, however it would be a 5 star app if the players had more control over the English on the ball. I prefer to control ball speed rather than not knowing . Also being able to set the curve or hook would be nice. There are a few balls that don't roll true as they roll over the finger holes and bounce.

This used to be a 5 star game but whatever the programer did has turned it into a 1 star game. It used to be very stable & fun to play now it is extremely unstable. It locks up, freezes, does not respond & quits without warning. I'm using a Nokia CS2 Tava w/OS 10 & ever since I started playing it on this phone I've had nothing but trouble w/it. Even when I swipe the ball to roll it just stands there then all of a sudden the ball will roll on its own. As the saying goes if it works don't fix it

Just keep on going. The longer you play the more entertaining it becomes! ADDED: In my mind this game is perfect. Might be a little too easy for experienced bowlers but well suited for beginners like me.

title: Hard Time (Prison Sim)
description:
The toughest prison sim in the yard - now celebrating over 10 MILLION downloads!!!

Create your own inmate and attempt to survive in a prison where every sentence is a "death" sentence. Rub shoulders with up to 100 fellow inmates in a sprawling jail of 12 unique areas, each filled with fully interactive furniture and props. Plus a life beyond the jail populated by real civilians, with wardens enforcing dozens of different laws to stop you from making a break for it.

Each day, you will find your health and mental state slipping away. Both can be restored by sleeping - which is also a good way to pass time. You won't always be permitted to sleep, though, so consuming food and drink bridges the gap. These, along with many other activities such as reading or watching TV, can also help to improve your mental state. If you "lose your mind" you will break down and will temporarily lose control of your character (almost certainly getting into trouble!).

Your character also has a set of attributes that you are challenged to improve:
- STRENGTH indicates how much damage you can inflict or absorb. You can improve it by fighting or lifting weights.
- AGILITY determines how fast you move. You can improve it by jogging in the yard or scoring baskets.
- INTELLECT reflects your knowledge - including fighting skills such as counters. You can improve it by reading books.
- REPUTATION is how much other prisoners respect you. It can be improved by accomplishing tasks or intimidating others.

There are also opportunities to earn money - whether you work for it with a broom, trade items at a profit, or run with a gang. Having money increases your opportunities to grease the wheels and make your life inside easier.

You may find that you need to go to the toilet from time to time, in which case you must race to the bathroom! Alternatively, you could find a toilet to sit on or grab some toilet paper to spare your blushes. Failing to do so will damage your reputation and mental state.

I regret that there is more to this game than I could ever explain here, so I hope you enjoy figuring some things out for yourself.

Upgrade to "VIP" to enjoy the full experience without ads - plus access to the editor that allows you to customize your character and every other.

BASIC CONTROLS:
(*Look out for tutorials within the actual game)
The game uses buttons where letters like GTA represent what they do:
G = Grapple / Throw weapon
T = Taunt (interact with handheld props)
A = Attack (on its own to kick, with a direction to punch)
R = Run
P = Pick-Up / Drop

OTHER CONTROLS
- Press ATTACK and RUN together to launch a powerful attack.
- Press any button with any direction (or none) in a grapple to trigger different moves.
- Press RUN and PICK-UP together to set fire to a small object (which can then be used to set fire to a large object).
- Touch the clock to pause the game and bring up options to exit.
- Touch any speech bubble to speed through conversations.

PERFORMANCE
- If you find your device struggles to display lots of characters, considering keeping the "Population" option low.
- "Speed Up Frame Rate" sleeping will require good performance at the default frame rate.
- Head to the "Display" options to tone down other features.

Each day, you will find your health and mental state slipping away. Both can be restored by sleeping - which is also a good way to pass time. You won't always be permitted to sleep, though, so consuming food and drink bridges the gap. These, along with many other activities such as reading or watching TV, can also help to improve your mental state. If you "lose your mind" you will break down and will temporarily lose control of your character (almost certainly getting into trouble!).

Your character also has a set of attributes that you are challenged to improve:
- STRENGTH indicates how much damage you can inflict or absorb. You can improve it by fighting or lifting weights.
- AGILITY determines how fast you move. You can improve it by jogging in the yard or scoring baskets.
- INTELLECT reflects your knowledge - including fighting skills such as counters. You can improve it by reading books.
- REPUTATION is how much other prisoners respect you. It can be improved by accomplishing tasks or intimidating others.

There are also opportunities to earn money - whether you work for it with a broom, trade items at a profit, or run with a gang. Having money increases your opportunities to grease the wheels and make your life inside easier.

You may find that you need to go to the toilet from time to time, in which case you must race to the bathroom! Alternatively, you could find a toilet to sit on or grab some toilet paper to spare your blushes. Failing to do so will damage your reputation and mental state.

I regret that there is more to this game than I could ever explain here, so I hope you enjoy figuring some things out for yourself.

Upgrade to "VIP" to enjoy the full experience without ads - plus access to the editor that allows you to customize your character and every other.

BASIC CONTROLS:
(*Look out for tutorials within the actual game)
The game uses buttons where letters like GTA represent what they do:
G = Grapple / Throw weapon
T = Taunt (interact with handheld props)
A = Attack (on its own to kick, with a direction to punch)
R = Run
P = Pick-Up / Drop

OTHER CONTROLS
- Press ATTACK and RUN together to launch a powerful attack.
- Press any button with any direction (or none) in a grapple to trigger different moves.
- Press RUN and PICK-UP together to set fire to a small object (which can then be used to set fire to a large object).
- Touch the clock to pause the game and bring up options to exit.
- Touch any speech bubble to speed through conversations.

PERFORMANCE
- If you find your device struggles to display lots of characters, considering keeping the "Population" option low.
- "Speed Up Frame Rate" sleeping will require good performance at the default frame rate.
- Head to the "Display" options to tone down other features.
summary: Attempt to survive in a prison where every sentence is a death sentence!

comments: This game used to be halfway decent, but that was before they started to put ads into every time that you go to sleep or you get caught doing something "wrong" which is about every two minutes pretty much(oh, and the ad's unskippable too, lmao). Also, they got rid of the character customization at the start, and now you have to buy every single thing. Screw you MDickie, and I was just starting to think that you were one of the good ones.

This game is the best MCDICKY game period. I have played countless hours and have paid hundreds of dollars to gain respect on prison grounds. The in-depth graphics are simply astonishing. The storyline is like a mixture between every steven spielberg movie created. This game amazes me, blows my mind. The content I experienced in this was better than I would of a Leon Lush video, and that's saying something. Also I genuinely dislike anyone who hates this game, ANYONE.

Great little game my partner and I paid the 2.99 to get rid of the adds, but there seems to be a glitch were you character seems to get take over and there is nothing you can do but wait till you get control again, please fix. Other than that great game.

the controls are simple but difficult but the game is great and i like how the fighting is hardcore and one hit can decide the hole thing but if you add in an option to what items appear in the prision it might make the game more reallistic but i love the way the game is in its own kind of universe lol Also it would be cool to have more experience with the gangs and have them be a bigger impact on how things go for you. And last about the update, why take away from the experience and put more ad

This game used to be halfway decent, but before they started to put aids into every time you go to sleep or you get caught doing something ''wrong'' and the frame is so slow. Once you had the thousand money, your life would be at risk. Wardens are attacking you for no reasons.

title: Tap Tap Punch
description:
The Riot of Losers!
From school loser to the top!
Destroy all the bullies!

Become 1st and leave a name in the world.

Home page
https://goo.gl/wDvnvn
https://www.facebook.com/daerisoft
https://twitter.com/daerisoft

■■■■■Game Introduction■■■■■

The old retro arcade game!
From school loser to the top!

Dear bullied students,
Become the bully and create a world without bullying!

Beat the bullies that have bullied you!
Defeat bullies, hoodlums and bad guys!

Tap away to feel the destruction on the tip of your fingers!

■■■■■Game Features■■■■■

■ Challenge Mode
- 1 on 1 battles with 5 bullies and bosses such as gang members.

■ Training Mode
- Train using sandbags to fight with bosses.

■ Characters
- Shuttle Kim : A character that is always bullied.
- Bully Choi : A bully and Shuttle Kim's first opponent.
- Hoodlum Yang : Always takes money from the alleys.
- Rider Park : Rides his bike wrecklessly in tiny streets.
- Gangsta Kang : A real powerful gangsta
- Yabetterun Ka : The final boss that is said to be a part of the Mafia in the past.

■ How to Play
- Watch for falling Blocks and press the blocks corresponding to attack and dodge.

Mobile action game with a twist of karma "Tap Tap Punch"
The valuable reviews that you leave behind are great for the developers ^^

From school loser to the top!
DaeriSoft's games will continue!
